rooms.description: Main entrance with a traditional Kerala-style lobby area incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Spacious living room adjoining the courtyard, featuring traditional tiled floors and decorative motifs typical of Nalukettu design.
Catering area adjacent to the living space with an open plan layout for family gatherings.
Well-equipped kitchen with modern amenities integrated into a traditional Kerala architectural style.
Quiet study/library area located in a corner to ensure serenity, designed according to Vastu for enhanced concentration and calm.
Dedicated private gym area integrated into the ground floor with soundproofing measures and climate control.
Spacious swimming pool zone located at one corner of the plot, designed in accordance with local building norms and ensuring safety margins.
Service area for domestic helpers, strategically placed to maintain privacy while remaining accessible.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style entrance with a carved wooden door and decorative motifs ensuring energy flow as per Vastu.
Balconies overlooking the courtyard, designed to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Large windows in living areas ensuring ample natural lighting while maintaining privacy using traditional lattice designs.

rooms.description: Master bedroom featuring a private balcony and integrated bathroom, designed with Vastu for restful sleep.
Secondary bedroom ensuring adequate space and traditional Kerala-style design.
Modern yet traditional bathroom adjoining the master bedroom.
Additional study area for personal work, designed to minimize distractions.
Storage closet integrated within the design to optimize space usage.

openings.description: Natural ventilator on the roof ensuring proper airflow in accordance with Vastu principles.
